text: Ružomberok (; ; ) is a town in northern Slovakia. It is in the Žilina Region. About 27,000 people live there. == Twin towns == Ružomberok is twinned with: * Bački Petrovac, Serbia * Děčín, Czech Republic * Gospić, Croatia * Hlučín, Czech Republic * Kroměříž, Czech Republic == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Towns in Slovakia Category:Žilina Region
title: Ružomberok
